text: A woman who was left with a deformed backside after having a tumor removed hopes doctors can fix her misshapen buttocks, which are growing up her back. Appearing on the E! reality series Botched, Sharon from Jesup, Georgia, admits that it has been difficult for her to be intimate with people because she is uncomfortable with how her butt looks.'I was born with a tumor on my lower back,'she explains in a preview clip for Wednesday night's episode.'Doctors then explained that I had spina bifida. They removed the tumor and, as a result of the surgery, my backside started to grow up.'Scroll down for video Struggle : Sharon from Jesup, Georgia, hopes doctors can fix her misshapen buttons on Wednesday night
